2.0.name: wordpress/weblumia-slider
2.0.description:
Features

  1. Admin interface to add, edit and manage slier and images.
  2. Capable of handling multiple images and videos.

Shortcodes

[lumiaslider id="{slider_id}"] - For displaying slider

Theme Functions

show_lumiaslider({slider_id}) - For display slider on page or posts

Support

So that others can share in the answer, please submit your support requests through the WordPress forums for WebLumia Slider.

If you want private or priority support, please donate at least $5 USD to cover my time.
